description:
Welcome to Leading Voices of Excel: Complete Intro to Excel 2016.

In this course you'll be introduced to a group of top Udemy instructors who are experts with Excel.

John Bura will be covering how to use VBA in Excel.

Jennifer Bailey will be sharing Excel tables, simple formatting and formula. 

Jordan Hudgens, will be teaching how pivot tables work in Excel 2016.

Martin Kenny will be going over using custom Excel templates to increase productivity.

Having a range of different perspectives on Excel helps students to expand their own understanding and see things from a fresh angle.

Keeping up to date with cutting edge technology, especially Excel 2016, is helpful for discovering new features, maximizing efficiency and being able implement at a higher level.
title: Leading Voices of Excel: Complete Intro to Excel for 2016
instructors: Martin Kenny, John Bura, Jennifer Bailey, Jordan Hudgens
